Anime: Teasing Master Takagi-san
Location: Tonosh≈ç, Japan
This is the main reason I'm presenting my map in this topic. I was browsing professor's reddit and found out he's a fan of this anime (so am I). It reminds me a lot of fun time during middle school hanging out with my crush.

Anime: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Location: Asakusa, Japan
A very popular anime/manga back in 2019. I really like the animation and the fighting scenes are amazing. I personally think the anime made the manga become popular due to the outstanding animation.

Anime: Your Name(Kimi no Na wa)
Location: Suga Shrine, Yotsuya, Japan
A classic written by Makoto Shinkai. He's very popular writer in Japan and every of his work in animes and light novels has been a massive success. I believe this anime will touch your heart (I won't spoil) but it's definitely worth it.
